channel.title: Bh style
channel.description: Ive made 2 pking portals 1 is for high lv cmb and 2nd is for low lv cmb. How do i make it so for high lv (100-126) is only allowed in the high lv portal, and low lv (60-90), is only allowed for low lv portal?

item.title: Bh style
item.dc:creator: @JRealm JRealm
item.description:
@JRealm wrote:

[code]
//Written by JRealm.
import java.io.*;
public class portaldemo {

public void lowLvls(int player, int portal) {
client client1 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[player];
switch(portal) {

case portalid://Low Lvls 60-90
if(client1.combat >= 60 && client1.combat <= 90) {
//Your Teleports Etc here.
} else { client1.gmes(“60 - 90 Combat Levels here Only.”); }
break;

case portalid://High Lvls 91-126
if(client1.combat >= 91 && client1.combat <= 126) {
//Your Teleports Etc here.
} else { client1.gmes(“91 - 126 Combat Levels here Only.”); }
break;

}
}

public portaldemo() { System.out.println(“By JRealm.”); }
}[/code]

Just needs some Modify in client.java.
